verbs.description: arnieta kurtz [V: brookfield] zoo [ARG0: volunteer] who had a giraffe named for her dies arnieta kurtz volunteered for so long at brookfield zoo that they named a baby giraffe for her she died last month at 73 children zoo childrens zoo chicago zoo arnieta brookfield zoo downers grove arnieta kurtz brookfield regi mezydlo
